definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
towards/to face/to turn towards/direction/to support/to side with/shortly before/formerly/always/all along/(suffix) suitable for .../oriented to ...
to tend toward/to guide/variant of 向[xiang4]
variant of 向[xiang4]/direction/orientation/to face/to turn toward/to/towards/shortly before/formerly

sentences.english: He sponsored legislation in Illinois that would ban discrimination on the basis of sexual orientation.
sentences.chinese: 在伊州，他资助了一项禁止性取向歧视的立法。

sentences.english: After questioning his sexuality, Emmett decides to join the group.
sentences.chinese: 埃米特在怀疑了自己的性取向后决定加入这个组织。

sentences.english: Or maybe hairstyles are suggestive of sexual orientation.
sentences.chinese: 或许发型也暗示了性取向。

sentences.english: Has your sexual orientation affected the approach to the show?
sentences.chinese: 你个人的性取向对这部剧集有没有影响？

sentences.english: Best friend's ex-girlfriend changed her sexual orientation.
sentences.chinese: 最好的朋友的前女友改变了她的性取向。

sentences.english: It's the first time a pollutant has been found to change an animal's sexual preference.
sentences.chinese: 这是研究人员首次发现污染物会改变动物的性取向。

sentences.english: So I'm pretty sure she's not harbouring same-sex tendencies.
sentences.chinese: 所以，我可以肯定她没有同性恋的性取向。

sentences.english: As to why these teens are doing better, Gartrell said, "Moms in the lesbian family are very committed, very involved parents."
sentences.chinese: 不管你的性取向如何，做个好父母可以让孩子更健康。

sentences.english: It also confirms that upbringing has little, if any, impact on sexual orientation.
sentences.chinese: 它也确认，教养对性取向即便有影响，也很小。

sentences.english: Organizations that discriminate against race, gender, sexual orientation or religion.
sentences.chinese: 具有种族，性别，性取向及宗教岐视的组织机构。

sentences.english: Gays and lesbians do not choose their sexual orientation any more than heterosexuals do.
sentences.chinese: 男女同性恋不再像异性恋者那样选择自己的性取向。

sentences.english: The origins of human sexual orientation have yet to be adequately explained.
sentences.chinese: 人类性取向的本原还未澄清。

sentences.english: For years, I've been open with many people about my ual orientation.
sentences.chinese: 多年来，我一直对很多人公开我的性取向。

sentences.english: His sexual orientation was questioned unexpectedly, making him feel wronged.
sentences.chinese: 他的性取向横遭大家质疑，他感到十分委屈。

sentences.english: The biggest problem with concealing your sexuality is walling yourself off from the people closest to you.
sentences.chinese: 最大的困惑是隐瞒我的性取向无形地把我和亲友阻隔。

definition: to come out of the closet/to reveal one's sexual orientation

pinyin: xing4 bie2 ren4 tong2 zhang4 ai4

definition: to fall into bad company/to make acquaintances indiscriminately
